description: This is a complete HTML file implementing the frontend interface for a database viewer application, including styles, layout, and client-side JavaScript for fetching and displaying database and table information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table of databases in sidebar and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data of a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data, handling wide content and complex objects.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, with expandability for long text or objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
